name: Tumblenaut
description:
You've been in space away from your spaceship for too long and now you need to get back to it before you run out of oxygen, but be careful, you only have a limited amount of fuel in your thruster pack and no way to replenish it!

Controls:

Mouse: Direction

Left Mouse Button: Fire thrusters

Space: Restart game

M: Toggle music on/off

Made for Ludum Dare #41 using:

  • Unity 2017.3
  • Visual Studio 2015
  • Pyxel Edit
  • Bosca Ceoil
  • BFXR
  • Audacity
  • "Press Start 2P" font by CodeMan38
